title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-

19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 1, by the substitution, in paragraph (2), of “6th 
day of September 2021” for “1st day of September 2021”, 
in Regulation 3A, by the substitution, in paragraph (c), of “and, 
in the case of an event having a number of sessions or 
performances per day may include a number of persons per 
session or performance” for “and, in the case of an event having 
a number of sessions per day may include a number of persons 
per session”, and 

(c) 

by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 
Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [446] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
provide that the Regulations remain in operation until 6 September 2021, and 
to make amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events” currently provided for 
under the Regulations, including a number of additional events. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [446]
